{"id":1454795244,"question_id":3251,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1731809330,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1454795244/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Area of Longest Diagonal Rectangle","memory":"29.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int areaOfMaxDiagonal(vector<vector<int>>& dimensions) { //For all indices i, 0 <= i < dimensions.length, dimensions[i][0] represents the length and dimensions[i][1] represents the width of the rectangle i\n        vector<vector<int>> top_dim;\n        float max_diag = 0;\n        vector<int> vl;\n        for(int i=0; i<dimensions.size(); i++) {\n            float diag_i = sqrt(dimensions[i][0]*dimensions[i][0]+dimensions[i][1]*dimensions[i][1]);\n            if(diag_i > max_diag) { \n                max_diag = diag_i;\n                vl.clear();\n                vl.push_back(i);\n            } else if(diag_i == max_diag)\n                vl.push_back(i);\n        };\n        int max_area = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<vl.size(); i++) {\n            int area_i = dimensions[vl[i]][0]*dimensions[vl[i]][1];\n            if(area_i > max_area) \n                max_area = area_i;\n        };\n        return max_area;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-area-of-longest-diagonal-rectangle","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
